step1.title: Log in first
step1.content: The Gallery uses safe and convenient social login. We only proceed with authentication and do not obtain any additional permissions.

step2.title: Create an exhibition
step2.content: In the workspace, click on the [ + ] card to create a new exhibition. Enter the basic information of the exhibition and easily open it.

step3.title: Register your artwork
step3.content: Click the edit button of the created exhibition to update the list of artworks. Fill in the title and description for each artwork, and also choose a suitable song.

step4.title: Enter the exhibition
step4.content: You can visit the exhibition by clicking the enter button. Aim at the frame to leave comments on the artwork.
